Class org.team19.VotingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team19.VotingSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    org.team19.InstantRunoffSystem, org.team19.OpenPartyListSystem
    public abstract class org.team19.VotingSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a voting system

        Initializes a org.team19.VotingSystem given the number of candidates
        Parameters:
        numCandidates - The number of candidates in the election
        auditOutput - The OutputStream to write detailed information about the running of the election
        reportOutput - The OutputStream to write a summary about the running of the election

        abstract java.util.Collection<org.team19.Pair<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getCandidates()
        Returns a Collection of org.team19.Pairs corresponding to the candidates, which should be available after parseCandidates(java.lang.String, int) has been executed successfully
        Returns:
        A Collection of org.team19.Pairs with each pair's key corresponding to the candidate's name and value corresponding to the party

                              int line)
                       throws java.text.ParseException
        Parses a String corresponding to candidates and party
        Parameters:
        candidates - The String representing the list of candidates and their parties
        line - The line number associated with the candidates String
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - Thrown if there is an issue in parsing the candidates String

                                int line)
                         throws java.text.ParseException
        Parses the lines corresponding to the header for the voting system
        Parameters:
        header - The lines corresponding to the header
        line - The line number associated with the first line of the header
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - Thrown if there is an issue in parsing the header

        Parses a line corresponding to a ballot and returns the ballot
        Parameters:
        ballot - The String corresponding to a ballot
        line - The line number associated with the current ballot line being read
